verbose_text: In addition, a significantly lower amount of eIF4E4 and eIF4G3 was co-precipitated with p-PABP1 by poly (A) beads from CRK1 RNAi cells than from the control cells (XREF_FIG), suggesting that CRK1 depletion impaired the association of the eIF4E4 - PABP1 - eIF4G3 complex with the poly (A) sequence.
